name: Minimalistic Games
description:
4 Games that were made in 5 days for the Minimax game jam. 

Game 1 - Nuclear Distancing - Try to avoid touching the nuclear waste by pressing space

Game 2 - Balloon Hit - Based on the game knife hit, try to pop all the balloons without hitting the spikes.

Game 3 - Explosive Picnic - Collect the apples but avoid the bombs

Game 4 - Balloon Ninja - Inspired on the game Fruit Ninja - Slice the apples before they touch the balloon
